sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Either returns or sets the last error message. The general syntax for its use is either msg = lasterr which returns the last error message that occured, or lasterr(msg) which sets the contents of the last error message.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here is an example of using the error function to set the last error, and then retrieving it using lasterr.

para.verbatim:
--> try; error('Test error message'); catch; end; --> lasterr
ans = Test error message

sect1.para: Or equivalently, using the second form:

para.verbatim:
--> lasterr('Test message'); --> lasterr
ans = Test message
